name: Strange Potion
description:
You found a potion on which was written "if you drink it you will hav unlimited mana.., you didnt read the last words and just washed it all down. After a while, you noticed something, you can't move.  You decided to read the whole description. The full description was: "If you drink it you will have unlimited mana, but, you will lose your abillity to move". You said... you said nothing and began to fight the coming enemies with your unlimited mana

Press left to rotate and right to shoot.

I used this tileset: https://0x72.itch.io/microfantasy
